actions.text: Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for consideration of Senate amendments to H.R. 10727, amending the Social Security Act.

summary.text: Provides that upon the adoption of this resolution the House shall take the following action with regard to the Senate amendments to H.R. 10727: (1) agree to specified amendments; (2) agree to other Senate amendments with House amendments as set forth in this resolution; and (3) disagree with other Senate amendments.

titles.title: A resolution providing for consideration of Senate amendments to H.R. 10727, amending the Social Security Act.
